text:
🥳Congratulations! Now you are ready to become a student of Innopolis University!😎

You know how to order reference, when you will receive scholarship, what events we have and how to join a club! Just couple of weeks ago you had no idea what awaits you here and NOW! Now you know as much as I do 👩‍🎓💪

🍀Good luck with your studies! We are really looking forward to meeting you at our university!

It was nice meeting you! 🤝 If you want to revise any topic, I'll be here for you!

Best regards,
Pro ‚ù§️
